data.boring_theme: going to the petrol station to pump diesel into a vehicle
data.output: The car was travelling too fast down the road. He couldn't keep control of the vehicle and he felt panic run through his veins. And in a flash, he had careered into the barriers where the stop and pump was smashed into it. Petrol and diesel was flung everywhere.

data.boring_theme: putting a stamp on the envelop containing a letter to send it
data.output: They had a love for beauty, of things done and action taken. The stamp was a special one, an anniversary stamp for a major national event. Eventually they'd send the letter, but in this case it was about appreciating the event and process. It was a lovely gesture for someone they cared deeply about.

data.boring_theme: having an organ empire and complying with regulations
data.output: The British empire was at its peak, the general had reigning power on the poor locals. All they had was to comply to this force that had entered their country. The churches were erected and instilled their unjust values. Inside one church, was a vast organ that rung out and around the land. A reminder to the occupied.

data.boring_theme: the feeling of gloom you have about an existing payment
data.output: The gloom had reached the house. It was mid winter and cold outside. He thought how could anyone exist like this? And to make matters worse make payment to their landlord. It was a harsh environment that they wouldn't wish on anyone.
